name: size
description: The size all block data in bytes

name: stripped_size
description: The size all block data in bytes excluding witness data

name: weight
description: Three times the base size plus the total size. https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0141.mediawiki

name: number
description: The number of blocks in the chain between this block and the genesis block.

name: version
description: Protocol version specified in block header

name: merkle_root
description: Hash of all the hashes of all the transactions in the block

name: timestamp
description: Block Creation timestamp specified in block header

name: nonce
description: Difficulty solution specified in block header (Integer)

name: bits
description: Difficulty threshold specified in block header (Hexadecimal)

name: transaction_count
description: Number of Transactions included in this block
